mapper.delete: DELETE FROM `like` WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND aca_id = #{acaId}
mapper.select: SELECT u.user_id AS userId, u.user_pic AS userPic FROM `like` l JOIN user u ON l.user_id = u.user_id WHERE l.aca_id = #{acaId}
SELECT a.aca_id AS acaId, a.aca_pic AS acaPic FROM `like` l JOIN academy a ON l.aca_id = a.aca_id WHERE l.user_id = #{userId}
